Description: Year for which to retrieve cost assumptions of ``resources/costs.csv``.
"latest" uses the yearly average of the latest available exchange rates for the selected `output_currency`
Share of rooftop PV when calculating capital cost of solar (joint rooftop and utility-scale PV).
Default values if not specified for a technology in ``resources/costs.csv``.

Values: Keys should be in the 'technology' column of ``resources/costs.csv``. Values can be any float.
Description: For the given technologies, assumptions about their marginal operating costs are set to the corresponding value. Optional; overwrites cost assumptions from ``resources/costs.csv``.
Specify exogenous prices for emission types listed in ``network.carriers`` to marginal costs.

Exogenous price of carbon-dioxide added to the marginal costs of fossil-fuelled generators according to their carbon intensity. Added through the keyword ``Ep`` in the ``{opts}`` wildcard only in the rule :mod:`prepare_network``.

Values: Keys should be in the 'technology' column of ``resources/costs.csv``. Values can be any float.
Description: For the given technologies, provided values overwrites cost assumptions from ``resources/costs.csv``.

Values: Keys should be in the 'technology' column of ``resources/costs.csv``. Values can be any float.
Description: For the given technologies, provided values overwrites Fixed Operations & Maintenance (FOM) assumptions from ``resources/costs.csv``.

Values: Keys should be in the 'technology' column of ``resources/costs.csv``. Values can be any float.
Description: For the given technologies, provided values overwrites Variable Operations & Maintenance (VOM) assumptions from ``resources/costs.csv``.

Values: Keys should be in the 'technology' column of ``resources/costs.csv``. Values can be any float.
Description: For the given technology, provided values overwrites fuel price assumptions from ``resources/costs.csv``.

Values: Keys should be in the 'technology' column of ``resources/costs.csv``. Values can be any float.
Description: For the given technology, provided values overwrites technology lifetime assumptions from ``resources/costs.csv``.

Values: Keys should be in the 'technology' column of ``resources/costs.csv``. Values can be any float.
Description: For the given technology, provided values overwrites efficiency assumptions from ``resources/costs.csv``.
